Gurr: Fuse Sparna and sacrifice a Tyrant

Girimehkala: Defeat in Yoyogi Park, Fuse Purski and sacrifice a Vile
Michael: Clear Baal Avatar's awakening, Requires Sacrificial Fusion
Samael: Clear Ahriman's awakening, Fuse Throne and sacrifice a Vile
Black Frost: Defeat in Kabukicho Prison, Recruit from Third Kalpa
Sakahagi: Defeat in Yoyogi Park, Rescue from Fourth Kalpa
Futomimi: Clear Baal Avatar's awakening, Rescue from Fourth Kalpa
Metatron: Defeat in Fifth Kalpa, Requires Sacrificial Fusion
Matador: Defeat in Great Underpass of Ginza, Fuse a Yoma during Kagutsuchi Phases 1-4 while holding a Deathstone
Daisoujou: Defeat in Ikebukuro, Fuse a Night during Kagutsuchi Phases 5-8 while holding a Deathstone
Hell Biker: Defeat in Ikebukuro Freeway, Fuse a Fairy during Kagutsuchi Phases 4-7 while holding a Deathstone
White Rider: Defeat in Terminal Room, Fuse a Yoma during Kagutsuchi Phase 0 while holding a Deathstone
Red Rider: Defeat in Great Underpass of Ginza, Fuse a Fairy during Kagutsuchi Phase 0 while holding a Deathstone
Black Rider: Defeat in Shinjuku Medical Center, Fuse a Night during Kagutsuchi Phase 0 while holding a Deathstone
Pale Rider: Defeat in Asakusa, Fuse a Tyrant during Kagutsuchi Phase 0 while holding a Deathstone
The Harlot: Defeat in Yoyogi Park, Fuse a Tyrant during Kagutsuchi Phase 4 while holding a Deathstone
Trumpeter: Defeat in Yurakucho Station, Fuse a Tyrant during Kagutsuchi Phase 8 while holding a Deathstone
